titleStmt.title: A declaration set forth by the lord lieutenant generall the gentlemen of the councell & assembly occasioned from the view of a printed paper. Entituled An act prohibiting trade with the Barbados, Virginea, Bermudes and Antegoe.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Samuel Broun English bookseller,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
